Threat: Nature: Earthquake, major natural disaster destroys server, hardware failure
Countermeasure: On-site server monitoring staff with the ability to hot swap malfunctioning drives, interrupt-free backup routine

Threat: Employees: Misconfigured or disabled backup routine
Gov. Agency: Physical compomise of the system
Countermeasure: Strictly restricted access to the hardware, regular hardware inspection

Threat: Skilled hacker, organized crime: Gain control over backup server
Countermeasure: Specially hardened server, firewall, only SSH port exposed Low Medium
